p: No abnormalities in terms of renal function, erythrocyte sedimentation rate (ESR), rheumatism, serum complement (C3/C4), quantitative immunoglobulin determination, immunoglobulin IgG4, antinuclear antibodies or ANCA were found. The possibility of Kimura's disease was not considered before surgery, and IgG4 and IgE levels were not detected before the operation. Positive laboratory results are shown in Table 1.
